com.assignment2.dos.smarterHomes

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.assignment2.dos.smarterHomes.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    Database is a file containing the status of the sensors as a CSV The format of the CSV is: sensorName, status, time This is the format in which the file is written But we are returning only the sensor name and status when read
